reviews.review_text: I bought two pairs men's size xL one pair, were a perfect true XL , the second pair marked XL also was about a medium size did not come close to fitting husband who is true XL ? I will let my son try these on and if he can't wear them I will return them sadly. They are a nice lightweight soft cotton, almost linen like. The price great, they look great. Husband says very comfortable. I wish both fit correctly. I will try again

reviews.title: honest, positive
reviews.review_text: So I originally ordered these pants for my boyfriend! I "accidentally" ordered him a small and ended up having to just keep them for myself. The fabric that they're made out of is so breathable and feels cool and refreshing against my skin. I also love the length and how the waist sits right on my waist line, without my having to fold them down! I want a pair of these in all the colors listed. I will def purchase again. I also didnt have to wait but four days for them to be delivered. Outstanding store and product.

These pants are cool and stilish but there is no fly?! If I did not like them so much I would return them. The picture and description did not mention that they were fly- less the company and walmart.com the distributors should have mentioned that.🙄

I ordered 6 pairs of pants and received 2 different brands of pants not as advertised. Three pairs of the cargo pants fit and of good quality. The others were a different product and style. Although the size stated 3X they were not true to size. I return them. zivwss very disappointed in the process.

reviews.title: Don't order these pants!!!
reviews.review_text: The pants shown on the website are absolutely nothing like the ones we received. The ones we received look like girl pants. The fabric is super thin and looks like it will tear easily. Don't order these pants. I guess you get what you pay for though.

This product and this app is a scam all products don't work this are for kids pants and they all products are scam this app is a waste of money and time ! I'll report this to Walmart center ! Fake, scam , spam and the worse products ever in prices, lier people

reviews.title: Don't buy!
reviews.review_text: Shipping took 2-3 weeks which was unexpected since when I ordered it I was told it would be a 2-3 days delivery since I am a Walmart plus customer. The pants are smaller than I expected. Not sure they will fit. They are cheaply made. I'm not satisfied at all.

reviews.title: One of the worse purchases ever
reviews.review_text: This was one of the worst pieces of clothes I've ever bought! Horrible quality/fabric. Looks extremely cheap and not as advertised at all. It was almost like a softer plastic! Didn't even try them on! DO NOT BUY!! You've been warned!
Horrible. Just horrible. The picture looks like quality cargo pants suitable for work, but in reality it's made out of thin, cheap, shiny fabric. Paid like $12 for shipping, it's a scam. Do not buy!

They are not cargo pants. They are for children. My wife who is 5'5 and 1150lbs tried these on for fun and they reach her ankles, have 0 stretch and are absolutely ridiculous in comfort, quality and material. Absolute waste of time

reviews.title: Two thumbs down
reviews.review_text: The fabric of the pants is super thin. The shipping was $8 each pair. I got four pairs and it came in one package. I thought they would be heavy duty like wranglers cargo pants but they are definitely not. I would send them back but don't want to lose all of the money I spent in shipping.

reviews.title: Do not buy from this vendor
reviews.review_text: in no way would I recommend this product nor this buyer they dragged their feet and then when they finally filled the order, they shipped it out and had to go through Canada and then they respond with a Chinese post tracking number for the United States Postal Service tracking number do not buy anything from this vendor on any e-commerce platform, They are not a legitimate vendor.

i ordered two pairs of black pants but these are dark brown. i was also expecting some kind of cotton blend material but these are made from a very thin, polyester-ish material. the tie strings are also very cheap and came apart during the wash cycle

reviews.title: No more pockets
reviews.review_text: The material is pretty cheap but I guess what do you expect for the price? I like the fit and they are comfortable. Would be much happier with the product if the pockets did not disintegrate the 1st time I wore these. Noticed a small rip at the top of both pockets at the beginning of the day and by the end of the day, the hole was down the entire pocket and nothing was staying in my pockets and more.
They look awesome before you wash them, then no matter if you follow washing instructions they wrinkle so bad

reviews.title: did not get it>
reviews.review_text: I ordered 3 of these and only rec'd 1 pair thius is the first time, this has , I don't know if I was charged for this or not.

reviews.title: Bad Material
reviews.review_text: I purchased three of them and never got to try any of them on because the first time through the washing machine the fabric was disintegrating/fraying on all three pairs.

ordered these for my grandson but they were to small , He wears a xl and i ordered xl but they were little bit to tight. I tryed to return, but they reimbursed my money and said to keep them. Thank You
nice material but them pockets bro 😂😂😂😂😂😂 i expected that from other reviews... I'll have to bust out the sewing machine... but overall good pants
When received looks like designed for a child not a man. Way too short and too small. Will be giving to 6 year old grandchild.

reviews.title: Who would even wear this???
reviews.review_text: The material is thin. Never seen pants or shorts made of this. I'm 6'2", and with them pulled up to my chest , the legs are off the floor.

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.review_text: There were no label informing care of product. I wash and it there were strings coming off everywhere.

reviews.title: Nice pants 👍
reviews.review_text: the material feels like it would be cheap but the quality of it is very nice, been wearing for over a month now and theyre my favourite pants. no rips or holes yet. i like that they have a drawstring around the ankles so they dont drag on the ground

Pants are constructed with comfortable material, lightweight and durable. Cargo pockets are large. Only real criticism; front top pockets need restitching before use as you will lose things when stitches come loose at bottom of pocket.

reviews.title: Couldn't handle one wash
reviews.review_text: I wore these pants once and washed them once. They have drawstrings at the bottoms that got completely shredded after one wash and tangled around my other clothes. They are flimsy and not ar all what I expected for "outdoor" pants.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I am very disappointed in you guys first of all I ordered burgundy pants y'all sent me red. Both of the pockets were ripped and they were too tight. It's a shame.

These pants are not cargo pants they are thin cotton. They are like scrubs only the material is scratchy on your skin. I don't know about fit because my son doesn't even want to put them on. I'll wash them and see if they will soften a little.

My husband LOVES these pants %26 the comfort. I ordered them in 4 colors. My husband where's a size Large, but based on the reviews I ordered XXL which fits him like a Large. They run very small. I'm soooo glad I read the reviews

reviews.title: They Shrink
reviews.review_text: I dont recommend them because the shrink when washed. How, my grandson likes them and I purchased two more and will only air dry them this time and see if that fixes the shrinkage problem. I'll update once they arrive

reviews.title: Not what I ordered
reviews.review_text: They are not the same pants I paid for online, they are too big, too long and the material is silky. I would like to return the item, can you send me a return label please and thank you

reviews.title: Dr Mary Ann Wells
reviews.review_text: As with the last 7 clothing items—- all are poor quality,not a bargain at all, and not what I was expecting. Wal Mart's clothing has really gone downhill. Don't think I will be buying any more clothing items.
Item was as expected and true to size. Grandson approved!
